# Hero

**Headline:** Singapore’s Trusted Experts in Demolition, Civil & Remediation
**Subhead:** We plan and deliver complex works for leading developers, facility owners, and main contractors—safely, compliantly, on schedule.
**Primary CTA:** Book a Site Visit
**Secondary CTA:** Get a Quick Quote
**Trust Strip (logos/text):** BCA Registered | BizSAFE | ISO 9001/14001/45001

# Value Props (3–4 bullets, with icons)

* **Safety First:** Zero-harm mindset, method statements and permits aligned to MOM/BCA requirements.
* **Complex Made Simple:** Live-site works, tight access, night shifts, and critical-path coordination.
* **End-to-End Delivery:** Demolition, reinstatement, civil works, remediation, and waste management.
* **On-Time, On-Budget:** Program-led execution with daily progress reporting.

# Services (Top Cards with “Learn More” links)

1. **General Construction & Demolition** — Structural, selective, and soft-strip demolition with engineered temporary works.
2. **Steel Work & Reinstatement** — Make-good to landlord standards; handover-ready finishes.
3. **Fire-Rated Systems** — Fire-rated glass, ceilings, and partitions with certified installation.
4. **Tension Membranes & Canopies** — Design–supply–install for industrial and commercial.
5. **Leak & Roof Works** — Repairs, installs, and long-term maintenance programs.
6. **Bird Netting & Access** — Humane protection for warehouses and facilities.

**Button:** View All Services

# Featured Projects (Carousel of 3–6)

* **Downtown Mall Selective Demolition** — 12 weeks; night shifts; zero incidents.
* **Pharma Plant Reinstatement** — GMP environment; dust-controlled works.
* **Grade-A Office Make-Good** — 60,000 sq ft; handover in 4 weeks.

**Button:** Explore Projects

# Process (4 steps)

1. **Survey & Methodology** — Site inspection, risk assessment, RAMS.
2. **Engineering & Permits** — Temporary works, calculations, and submissions.
3. **Execution & Monitoring** — Supervised crews, toolbox talks, daily reports.
4. **Handover & Compliance** — QA/QC, waste tickets, close-out documentation.

## Layout & Grid

* **Max width:** 1200–1280px container; 24px gutter.
* **Grid:** 12-col desktop, 6-col tablet, 4-col mobile.
* **Spacing scale:** 8/12/16/24/32/48/64.
* **Radius:** 16–20px on cards, soft shadows at elevation 1–2.

## Header

* Sticky, 72px height; logo left, nav center, CTA right (“Book a Site Visit”).
* **Nav:** Home • Services • Projects • About • Contact.
* Mobile: slide-in menu, large targets, the CTA stays as a top-right button.

## Hero

* Full-bleed image/video with dark overlay (60–70%).
* H1 48–56px; subhead 18–20px; 2 CTA buttons (primary solid, secondary outline).
* Trust strip (certification badges) below CTAs.

## Value Props

* 4 cards in a row (desktop), 2x2 tablet, stack mobile.
* Simple line icons, concise copy (max 12 words each).

## Services

* 6 cards grid (3x2 desktop; 2x3 tablet; 1x6 mobile).
* Each card: image → title → 2-line summary → “Learn More”.
* Optional accent color per category.

## Projects (Carousel)

* 3 cards visible desktop, swipe on mobile.
* Card: photo, title, 1-line scope, tags (e.g., “night works”, “live site”).
* “Explore Projects” button links to /projects.

## Process

* 4-step horizontal timeline on desktop; vertical stack on mobile.
* Each step has a small icon and 1–2 lines.

## Credentials / Badges

* Row of logos/badges; ensure alt text for accessibility and SEO.

## Testimonials

* 2–3 slides, auto-play with manual controls.
* Photo/initials avatar; name, role, company; short quote.

## CTA Banner

* Full-width band; contrasting background; two buttons + WhatsApp.
* Include microcopy: “We respond within 24 hours on business days.”

## Contact

* Two-column: form (2/3) + details (1/3).
* Validate fields; disable submit until valid; success state with reference ID.

## Footer

* 4 columns on desktop; stack on mobile.
* Include WhatsApp floating button fixed bottom-right on mobile.

## Visual Language

* **Colors (suggested):**

  * Primary: #0E5AA7 (steel blue)
  * Accent: #F59E0B (worksite amber)
  * Neutral: #0B1220 (ink), #6B7280 (muted), #F3F4F6 (light)
* **Type:**

  * Headings: **Outfit** or **Inter** (700)
  * Body: **Inter** (400/500)

## Motion

* Subtle fade/slide on cards and section entrances (Framer Motion).
* Reduce on prefers-reduced-motion.

## Accessibility

* 4.5:1 contrast for text.
* Keyboard focus visible; skip-to-content link.
* Alt text for all non-decorative images.

## Performance

* Next/Image or WebP; lazy-load below the fold.
* Inline critical CSS; defer non-critical scripts.
* Use Cloudflare CDN and HTTP/2/3.

## SEO

* H1: “Singapore’s Trusted Experts in Demolition, Civil & Remediation.”
* One H1 only; semantic sections (header/main/section/footer).
* LocalBusiness schema; Service/Project schema on detail pages.
* Location landing pages (e.g., “Demolition Contractors Singapore”).

## Analytics & Conversions

* Define events: hero CTA click, form start/submit, WhatsApp click, phone tap.
* Set up GA4 + Consent mode; enable server-side email delivery with SPF/DKIM.
